name: Finger Dancing Free
description:
- Finger Dancing Free is free version of Finger Dancing.
- Finger Dancing Free is the most music game and the only music rhythm game that you can play with your own music!
- See how fast your fingers can move on the dance floor! Rock out your finger dancing passion wherever you are.
- You can play with the preload songs or your local music files by your favorite artists.
Feature:
- Start by first choosing a difficulty level.
- Play songs on your device!!!
- Once the game begins, tap the arrows at the bottom of the screen to the beat.

- Try this incredible game that will keep you entertained for a long time!
